HostProperties.tag: Linux Kernel 2.2 Linux Kernel 2.4 Linux Kernel 2.6

ReportItem.description:
This plugin displays, for each tested host, information about the scan itself :
- The version of the plugin set. - The type of scanner (Nessus or Nessus Home). - The version of the Nessus Engine. - The port scanner(s) used. - The port range scanned. - Whether credentialed or third-party patch management checks are possible. - The date of the scan. - The duration of the scan. - The number of hosts scanned in parallel. - The number of checks done in parallel.
ReportItem.synopsis: This plugin displays information about the Nessus scan.
ReportItem.plugin_output:
Information about this scan :
Nessus version : 7.0.3 Plugin feed version : 201804120615 Scanner edition used : Nessus Scan type : Normal Scan policy used : Basic Network Scan Scanner IP : 10.168.69.130 Port scanner(s) : nessus_syn_scanner Port range : default Thorough tests : no Experimental tests : no Paranoia level : 1 Report verbosity : 1 Safe checks : yes Optimize the test : yes Credentialed checks : no Patch management checks : None CGI scanning : disabled Web application tests : disabled Max hosts : 30 Max checks : 4 Recv timeout : 5 Backports : None Allow post-scan editing: Yes Scan Start Date : 2018/4/12 16:30 -03 Scan duration : 605 sec

ReportItem.pluginName: SSL Certificate Chain Contains Certificates Expiring Soon
ReportItem.description: The remote host has an SSL certificate chain with one or more SSL certificates that are going to expire soon. Failure to renew these certificates before the expiration date may result in denial of service for users.
ReportItem.plugin_name: SSL Certificate Chain Contains Certificates Expiring Soon
ReportItem.solution: Renew any soon to expire SSL certificates.
ReportItem.synopsis: The remote host has an SSL certificate chain with one or more certificates that are going to expire soon.
ReportItem.plugin_output:
The following soon to expire certificate was part of the certificate chain sent by the remote host :
|-Subject : CN=www.epocacosmeticos.com.br |-Not After : May 29 16:39:40 2018 GMT

ReportItem.pluginName: Web Site Cross-Domain Policy File Detection
ReportItem.description: The remote web server contains a cross-domain policy file. This is a simple XML file used by Adobe's Flash Player to allow access to data that resides outside the exact web domain from which a Flash movie file originated.
ReportItem.plugin_name: Web Site Cross-Domain Policy File Detection
ReportItem.solution: Review the contents of the policy file carefully. Improper policies, especially an unrestricted one with just '*', could allow for cross- site request forgery and cross-site scripting attacks against the web server.
ReportItem.synopsis: The remote web server contains a 'crossdomain.xml' file.
ReportItem.plugin_output:
Nessus was able to obtain a cross-domain policy file from the remote host using the following URL :
https://www.epocacosmeticos.com.br/crossdomain.xml

ReportItem.description: The remote HTTPS server is not enforcing HTTP Strict Transport Security (HSTS). The lack of HSTS allows downgrade attacks, SSL-stripping man-in-the-middle attacks, and weakens cookie-hijacking protections.
ReportItem.solution: Configure the remote web server to use HSTS.
ReportItem.synopsis: The remote web server is not enforcing HSTS.
ReportItem.plugin_output: The remote HTTPS server does not send the HTTP "Strict-Transport-Security" header.

ReportItem.description: The remote host contains a file named 'robots.txt' that is intended to prevent web 'robots' from visiting certain directories in a website for maintenance or indexing purposes. A malicious user may also be able to use the contents of this file to learn of sensitive documents or directories on the affected site and either retrieve them directly or target them for other attacks.
ReportItem.solution: Review the contents of the site's robots.txt file, use Robots META tags instead of entries in the robots.txt file, and/or adjust the web server's access controls to limit access to sensitive material.
ReportItem.synopsis: The remote web server contains a 'robots.txt' file.
ReportItem.plugin_output:
Contents of robots.txt :
Sitemap: https://www.epocacosmeticos.com.br/sitemap.xml Sitemap: https://www.epocacosmeticos.com.br/XMLData/sitemap_images.xml
